description:
Discover how to successfully set and achieve any goal in your life. Most people fail at goal setting because they don't have a structured and proven process to follow.

In this 15 lecture course you will learn a 13 step process to successfully set and achieve your goals. The trainer - Hari Kalymnios - will guide you through an amazing process designed to take you from not even knowing what your goals are, to having a plan on how to achieve them.

Each training session is delivered on camera with Hari training you directly.

This course will take you through the process with you following along so to get the best out of it you will need a notebook and pen and time to pause the videos and do the exercises required.
title: Goal Setting Made Simple: Create the Life You Want
